pullRequest.title: Feature/exam multi correction/exam db and view changes
pullRequest.bodyText:
Checklist

 I tested all changes and all related features with different users (student, tutor, instructor, admin) on the test server https://artemistest.ase.in.tum.de.
 Server: I followed the coding and design guidelines.
 Server: I implemented the changes with a good performance and prevented too many database calls
 Server: I documented the Java code using JavaDoc style.
 Client: I followed the coding and design guidelines.
 Client: I documented the TypeScript code using JSDoc style.
 Client: I added multiple screenshots/screencasts of my UI changes
 Client: I translated all the newly inserted strings into German and English

Motivation and Context


This PR will lay the groundwork necessary to implement the exam multi correction feature. It adds / changes / refactors the components within the client and server to display the multiple corrections within the dashboard views and progress bars.
Description
The following changes are done within this PR:

Criteria 1: All behavior related to non-Exam Exercises and views should be exactly as it was
Criteria 2: When creating a new Exam, the user can choose between 1 or 2 correction rounds. As a default, '1' is already selected.
Criteria 3: When 1 correction round is selected for the exam, everything works exactly as it was
Criteria 4: When 2 correction rounds are selected, the progress bar within the Assessment Dashboard + Exercise Dashboard will show an additional bar. This bar currently will not be filled with information, as we don't support multiple corrections currently.
Criteria 5: When 2 concretion rounds are selected, an additional list is shown within the Exercise Dashboard. It currently does not show any assessments to the tutor and always stays empty (until we support multiple corrections)

Steps for Testing


See Criteria 1-5
Please note:
All criteria must work for all exercises and for exam / not exam
All criteria must work with existing exercises / exams
All criteria must work with new exercises / exams

Test Coverage

tutor-participation-graph: 85.92
exercise-assessment-dashboard: 84.98

Screenshots

commit.message: added exam table multi correction column and first changes to direct Exam components
added exam table multi correction column and first changes to direct Exam components
First version of changes to enable view of multiple results including renaming of properties
Added checks to exam creation to only allow one or two correction rounds
refactored stats calls and renamed method
refactored calls for dasboards duedatestat arrays

+<databaseChangeLog xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog" xmlns:ext="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog-ext" xmlns:pro="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/pro" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog-ext http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-ext.xsd http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/pro http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/pro/liquibase-pro-4.1.xsd http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-4.1.xsd">
+    <changeSet author="ruscher" id="20201214203018">
+        <addColumn tableName="exam">
+            <column name="number_of_correction_rounds_in_exam" type="INT" defaultValueNumeric="1"/>

commit.message:
Apply suggestions from code review

Co-authored-by: Stephan Krusche <krusche@in.tum.de>
Fixed bug where the exam progressbar was broken due to faulty query
fixed test failing due to missing attribute
refactoring, renaming of method with bad naming, fixed test
only allow 1 or 2 as input for correctionRounds
removed displaying of correctionRounds in exam information component
added tests, added missing calls to setLatestSubmissionResults, fixed count query
Fix progressbar Bug, added logs for debugging

nodes.bodyText: I this not relevant for the future? Then it could be removed

nodes.bodyText: Just a suggestion but maybe we rename this method so we know it handles specifically latestSubmissions like convertLatestSubmissionFromServer? We have similar methods with this name and usually they just convert the given object, here more is done and this should show in the method name i guess
Some small GitHub Actions suggestions, not used imports. Please remove them
you have a type here, this should be FileUploadSubmission
Technically there can never be late assessments for exams, and for course exercises there is only one assessment round. Depending on how we handle this however we can probably remove this
